draft.description: DRAFT VERSION will be replaced in the citation with the selected version once the dataset has been published.

deaccessioned.description: DEACCESSIONED VERSION has been added to the citation for this version since it is no longer available.

alerts.draftVersion: This draft version needs to be published. When ready for sharing, please publish it so that others can see these changes
alerts.requestedVersionNotFound: Version {{requestedVersion}} was not found. This is version {{returnedVersion}}.
alerts.unpublishedDataset: Privately share this dataset before it is published: {{privateUrl}}
